about_the_game:
« 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗦𝗘 »

Mainasutto: I'm not Alone is a metroidvania about time, set on a dreamlike dark fantasy world, where decision making is crucial for our protagonists to save their timeline.




« 𝗦𝗬𝗡𝗢𝗣𝗦𝗜𝗦 »

Time stopped, and creatures of this world have been living within the same night for years, yet no one remembers the time this happened or the world before this. Occasionally the hands of a mysterious clock appear in the sky, some called it the Doomsday Clock, and no one knows what will happen when the hands return to the beginning.

The Council, who now rules and control what the world can or cannot do, discovered a way to make the hands move, however, there are some individuals who have been able to remember their life before the "incident" and try to stop them since these could be bringing the world to an end, they formed a group of rebels calling themselves Reminiscence.

Both The Council and Reminiscence search for the pieces of a mysterious artifact that seems to have the power to control time if its pieces are put together. You enter here, taking control of Keybold and Ebura members of opposing groups, can you make the right decisions to save the world?

« 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 »

Non-Lineal Exploration

Explore each barrier of temporal corruption and discover the different areas seeking to save your timeline, in a dreamlike, dark and corrupt world.


Self-Paced Combat

Attack, dash, parry and attack again! or just relax and explore the world and do some sidequest. Level up, learn new skills, meet new friends and enemies, or just go and fight every boss and complete the game as fast as possible.
It's your choice!

Completionist?

Discover the world where time stops, and explore this cursed vast lands full of different characters!
Find over 100 quests, multiple companions and optional areas to test your skills while an epic pixel art & chiptune soundtrack follow you during your adventure.

Customize Yourself

Discover new skills, collect soul fragments, equip yourself with upgrades and change your weapon according to your combat style.
Experiment with different combinations and discover the one you like the most.

Choose Your Side

Play 2 sides of the same story! Ebura's "Reminiscense" story and Keybold's "Council" story, two rival clans looking for the same but with different visions.
Your choices will lead one of the clans to the victory.

Change The Future

Change our destiny, save your friends, kill your enemies, make a choice.
Every action matters, every decision you make, every path you take, and every character you met, may change the future of this world and the length of our story.
Would you get all the endings?
detailed_description:
Mainasutto Community

I'm a solo-dev working on this project, so I would love to get your feedback about Mainasutto: I'm Not Alone!

Join the community using the links in the sidebar!


About the Game

« 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗦𝗘 »

name: Mainasutto: I'm Not Alone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any 64-bits from 2016 or later should run it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mainasutto: I'm Not Alone is a metroidvania about time and choice-making, set on a dream-like world, where decision making is crucial for our protagonists to save their timeline.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
